mapper.insert: insert into board_comment( pid, content, userid ) values ( #{pid}, #{content}, #{userid} )
mapper.select: select to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') writedate, c.*, (select name from member where userid = c.userid) name from board_comment c where pid = #{pid} order by id desc
mapper.update: update board_comment set content = #{content} where id = #{id}
